name: Dismissal Delivery
description:
Dismissal Delivery is about you (the boss) firing employees by throwing paper airplanes. Steer your way through the office building by using vents and office fans to fire unsuspecting employees.

This project is a prototype made by a group of 2nd year students studying Bachelor of Software Engineering and Bachelor of Creative Technologies under Media Design School, New Zealand.

This prototype was our first as a group. If you're interested in looking at our next prototype Click Here. For each prototype we're only given 1 week to create so bugs, errors and issues are inevitable.

CONTROLS
    ⯈  Mouse To Aim
   ⯈  Left Click To Throw
   ⯈  'A' and 'D' To Steer

PROGRAMMERS - Bachelor of Software Engineering
   ⯈  Justin Yuen
   ⯈  Ben Zaher
   ⯈  David Haverland

ARTISTS - Bachelor of Creative Technologies
   ⯈  Ben Aitkenhead
   ⯈  Tyler Parkinson
   ⯈  Stuart Whittaker
